body:
Comment 1: 
Bisect:

14b4ad05c021 is bad
go1 is good
b70aa9592f5b is good (May 18 02:41:49 2013)
ed08d206a05c is good (Aug 01 12:58:27 2013)
1ee3ab13e3b6 is good (Aug 30 15:46:12 2013)

2aef8fd83bbd is bad (clean up map code)
8d26ff4a7e5d is good (syscall: z* files for dragonfly/386)
f61bc90c00b3 is good (runtime, syscall: add support for dragonfly/386)
14cf1c9a2408 is good (cmd/8l: add support for dragonfly/386)

So the first commit it starts crashing at is:

changeset:   17981:2aef8fd83bbd
user:        Keith Randall <khr@golang.org>
date:        Sat Aug 31 14:09:34 2013 -0700
summary:     runtime: clean up map code.  Remove hashmap.h.

... which makes no sense.
_Owner changed to @randall77._
